API docs by Redocly

OpsChain API (v1)

Download OpenAPI specification:Download

LimePoint Pty Ltd: opschain@limepoint.com URL: https://opschain.io

Introduction

OpsChain is an orchestration and change automation platform based in GitOps principles with a core objective to Unify Change. Connect, automate, and orchestrate people, processes, and tools across your on-premise and cloud platforms.

Projects

Endpoints to interact with projects.

Notes:

  • The show and list response payloads include links to the project's assets, changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints. These endpoints act like the assets, changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints respectively.
  • The list, create, show, update and archive asset endpoints are available via the /<path/to/asset/owner>/assets path. The example endpoints in this section reflect assets owned by a project.

List projects

Lists all projects (including archived projects).

Each project in the response includes a link to:

  • the project's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this project. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the project's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this project. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the project's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this project. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the project's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this project. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the project's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this project's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the project's workflows endpoint for viewing this project's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[code_eq]=opc

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=projects.csv

Download the projects in CSV format with the specified file name. The projects will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "b66c69fd-3537-4577-b525-972315f03c31",
      • "type": "project",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "opc",
        • "name": "OpsChain",
        • "description": "OpsChain project",
        • "archived": false,
        • "project_type": "Enterprise"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "583c6471-60e4-4205-bc26-d1fd394b1242",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/583c6471-60e4-4205-bc26-d1fd394b1242"
            }
          },
        • "parents": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "0ad4ab75-b429-458c-a411-bb902c33767e",
            • "type": "settings"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/settings/0ad4ab75-b429-458c-a411-bb902c33767e"
            }
          },
        • "children": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "bookmarks": {
          • "data": [ ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/opc/bookmarks",
        • "changes": "/api/projects/opc/changes",
        • "scheduled_activities": "/api/projects/opc/scheduled_activities",
        • "git_remotes": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes",
        • "workflows": "/api/projects/opc/workflows",
        • "workflow_runs": "/api/projects/opc/workflow_runs",
        • "templates": "/api/projects/opc/templates",
        • "environments": "/api/projects/opc/environments",
        • "assets": "/api/projects/opc/assets"
        },
      • "meta": {
        • "can_have_changes": true,
        • "can_have_children": true,
        • "can_have_properties": true,
        • "can_have_settings": true,
        • "can_have_templates": true,
        • "requires_template": false,
        • "child_node_types": [
          • "environment",
          • "asset"
          ],
        • "can_have_workflows": true,
        • "authorisations": {
          • "properties": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "settings": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "scheduled_activities": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "git_remotes": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "templates": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "workflows": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "changes": {
            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },
          • "workflow_runs": {
            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },
          • "environments": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "assets": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "self": {
            • "update": true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Create project

Creates a project.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "opc",
      • "name": "OpsChain",
      • "description": "OpsChain project",
      • "project_type": "Enterprise"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "6d0d5649-ec23-4796-bab1-97cdd9393826",
    • "type": "project",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "d6s4d",
      • "name": "quos318",
      • "description": "Cupiditate sunt qui voluptatem.",
      • "archived": false,
      • "project_type": "Standard"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "abdca061-2f4c-4e7f-a07d-f1d4b961c687",
          • "type": "properties"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/abdca061-2f4c-4e7f-a07d-f1d4b961c687"
          }
        },
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "settings": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "bfec26b6-6bda-4817-bf5f-4ea159b2a93a",
          • "type": "settings"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/settings/bfec26b6-6bda-4817-bf5f-4ea159b2a93a"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "bookmarks": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/d6s4d",
      • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/d6s4d/bookmarks",
      • "git_remotes": "/api/projects/d6s4d/git_remotes",
      • "environments": "/api/projects/d6s4d/environments"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "can_have_changes": false,
      • "can_have_children": true,
      • "can_have_properties": true,
      • "can_have_settings": true,
      • "can_have_templates": false,
      • "requires_template": false,
      • "child_node_types": [
        • "environment"
        ],
      • "can_have_workflows": false,
      • "authorisations": {
        • "properties": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "git_remotes": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "changes": {
          • "read": true,
          • "execute": false
          },
        • "environments": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "self": {
          • "update": true
          }
        }
      }
    }
}

Show project

Shows a project, including any direct children.

The response includes a link to:

  • the project's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this project. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the project's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this project. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the project's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this project. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the project's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this project. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the project's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this project's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the project's workflows endpoint for viewing this project's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type

Update project

Updates a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Modified",
      • "description": "The updated project",
      • "archived": false
      }
    }
}

  • 400
  • 404

Archive project

Archives a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Environments

Endpoints to interact with environments.

Notes:

  • The show and list response payloads include links to the environment's assets, changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints. These endpoints act like the assets, changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints respectively.
  • The list, create, show, update and archive asset endpoints are available via the /<path/to/asset/owner>/assets path. The example endpoints in this section reflect assets owned by a project.

List environments

Lists all project environments (including archived environments).

Each environment in the response includes a link to:

  • the environment's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this environment. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the environment's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this environment. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the environment's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this environment. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the environment's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this environment. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the environment's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this environment's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the environment's workflows endpoint for viewing this environment's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=Test

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=environments.csv

Download the project environments in CSV format with the specified file name. The environments will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "aeafcda9-aa64-46fd-8da0-188057f0a8c8",
      • "type": "environment",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "dev",
        • "name": "Development",
        • "description": "OpsChain development environment",
        • "archived": false
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "0c909372-edf0-43dd-9dcc-624a238d4d5f",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/0c909372-edf0-43dd-9dcc-624a238d4d5f"
            }
          },
        • "parents": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "99902b2c-b3e7-48e2-af37-6db0e544559b",
              • "type": "project"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "708d586e-5748-446e-a180-a569856f4327",
            • "type": "settings"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/settings/708d586e-5748-446e-a180-a569856f4327"
            }
          },
        • "project": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "99902b2c-b3e7-48e2-af37-6db0e544559b",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/projects/opc"
            }
          },
        • "children": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "bookmarks": {
          • "data": [ ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",
        • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/bookmarks",
        • "changes": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/changes",
        • "scheduled_activities": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/scheduled_activities",
        • "parent": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "assets": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/assets"
        },
      • "meta": {
        • "can_have_changes": true,
        • "can_have_children": true,
        • "can_have_properties": true,
        • "can_have_settings": true,
        • "can_have_templates": false,
        • "requires_template": false,
        • "child_node_types": [
          • "asset"
          ],
        • "can_have_workflows": false,
        • "authorisations": {
          • "properties": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "settings": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "scheduled_activities": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "changes": {
            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },
          • "assets": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "self": {
            • "update": true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    ]
}

Create environment

Creates an environment.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "dev",
      • "name": "Development",
      • "description": "OpsChain development environment"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "e78bcc38-900d-4b29-a10a-884fe405db79",
    • "type": "environment",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "djcqw",
      • "name": "dolorem272",
      • "description": "Debitis quis vitae atque.",
      • "archived": false
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "1f3ad99f-d9f7-46c0-9955-d6931e6bded7",

          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/1f3ad99f-d9f7-46c0-9955-d6931e6bded7"
          }

          • {

        }
      },

Show environment

Shows an environment.

The response includes a link to:

  • the environment's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this environment. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the environment's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this environment. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the environment's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this environment. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the environment's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this environment. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the environment's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this environment's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the environment's workflows endpoint for viewing this environment's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

environment_code
required
string
Example: dev

environment code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments/{environment_code}

Updates an environment.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

environment_code
required
string
Example: dev

environment code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments/{environment_code}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Modified",
      • "description": "The updated environment",
      • "archived": false
      }
    }
}

Archives an environment.

project code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments/{environment_code}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Assets

Endpoints to interact with assets.

Notes:

  • The show and list response payloads include links to the asset's changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints. These endpoints act like the changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints respectively.
  • The list, create, show, update and archive asset endpoints are available via the /<path/to/asset/owner>/assets path. The example endpoints in this section reflect assets owned by a project.

List assets

Lists all assets (including archived assets) that belong to the project.

Each asset in the response includes a link to:

  • the asset's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this asset. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the asset's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this asset. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the asset's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this asset. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the asset's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this asset. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the asset's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this asset's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the asset's workflows endpoint for viewing this asset's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=Test

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=assets.csv

Download the project assets in CSV format with the specified file name. The assets will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{

Create asset

Creates an asset belonging to the project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "prj_soa",
      • "name": "Project asset",
      • "description": "Project asset description",
      • "template_name": "Oracle SOA template",
      • "template_version": "2023_Q4_2"
      }
    }
}

  • 201
  • 400
Content type

Show asset

Shows an asset belonging to a project.

The response includes a link to:

  • the asset's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this asset. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the asset's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this asset. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the asset's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this asset. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the asset's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this asset. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the asset's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this asset's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the asset's workflows endpoint for viewing this asset's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects or objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "97711b61-2ca4-4889-a47b-b9c9096bf533",
    • "type": "asset",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "prj_soa",
      • "name": "Project asset",
      • "description": "Project asset description",
      • "archived": false,
      • "actions": [
        • {
          • "name": "calculate",
          • "description": "Iure voluptatem rerum ut."
          },
        • {
          • "name": "index",
          • "description": "Sit facilis soluta accusamus."

Update asset

Updates an asset belonging to a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects or objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Modified",
      • "description": "The updated asset",
      • "archived": false
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "49016166-e4a9-4a01-8022-71770d54f327",

Archive asset

Archives an asset belonging to a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Show converged properties

Show the converged properties as they will appear to actions run on this asset. i.e. the endpoint will

  1. merge any template (repository) properties from the asset's template (in the order described in the documentation)
  2. merge any project properties
  3. merge any properties assigned to the project asset

The API response will also include all the individual repository and database properties that were included in the result.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[action_eq]=Test

API filtering guide

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/converged_properties

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "prj_soa",
    • "type": "converged_properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "repo": "project_properties",
        • "common": "property",
        • "project": "property",
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        }
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "repository_properties": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "properties.yaml",
            • "type": "repository_properties"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "projects/opc.yaml",
            • "type": "repository_properties"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "properties": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "372100f3-b155-44dc-9d94-06ebb9885509",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "a7c7846e-da05-44a2-96fe-847a812e75fe",
            • "type": "properties"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/converged_properties"
      }
    },
  • "included": [
    • {
      • "id": "372100f3-b155-44dc-9d94-06ebb9885509",
      • "type": "properties",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "any_key": "with a value",
          • "another_key": "with a different value",
          • "nested": {
            • "key": "nested value"
            }
          },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:05.000377Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "owner": {
          • "links": {
            • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/properties/372100f3-b155-44dc-9d94-06ebb9885509",
        • "current_version": "/api/properties/372100f3-b155-44dc-9d94-06ebb9885509/versions/1",
        • "versions": "/api/properties/372100f3-b155-44dc-9d94-06ebb9885509/versions"
        }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "a7c7846e-da05-44a2-96fe-847a812e75fe",
      • "type": "properties",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": { },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:05.066387Z"

          }

        • "self": "/api/properties/a7c7846e-da05-44a2-96fe-847a812e75fe",

        • "versions": "/api/properties/a7c7846e-da05-44a2-96fe-847a812e75fe/versions"
        }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "properties.yaml",
      • "type": "repository_properties",
      • "attributes": {
        • "content": {
          • "repo": "base_properties",
          • "common": "property"
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "repository_path": ".opschain/properties.yaml"
        }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "projects/opc.yaml",
      • "type": "repository_properties",
      • "attributes": {
        • "content": {
          • "repo": "project_properties",
          • "project": "property"
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "repository_path": ".opschain/projects/opc.yaml"
        }
      }
    ]
}

List template version history

Lists the template versions that have been assigned to the asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=Test

API filtering guide

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/version_history

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "c7da9258-3968-4ba8-99fd-746061eb91c9",
      • "type": "template_version_history",
      • "attributes": {
        • "active_from": "2025-03-28T07:14:20.678549Z",
        • "active_to": null
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "owner": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "79347a3c-3d9a-49d5-b333-d26e0b1db138",
            • "type": "asset"
            }
          },
        • "template_version": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "cc1f58c8-4cfe-437a-acfa-a8f4055539b5",
            • "type": "template_version"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "template_version": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/version_history/c7da9258-3968-4ba8-99fd-746061eb91c9",
        • "asset": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Show template version history

Shows a specific project asset's template version history record.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

id
required
string
Example: e780f794-e4bb-4c2e-a00b-65de4571024c

version history id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/version_history/{id}

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "c4b4cdf5-dc15-41bf-8fa0-58634975d012",
    • "type": "template_version_history",
    • "attributes": {
      • "active_from": "2025-03-28T07:14:20.899104Z",
      • "active_to": null
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "57132105-75bf-49fc-b40d-151c65f776df",
          • "type": "asset"
          }
        },
      • "template_version": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "e0c691c8-efc2-48e0-9f54-0aed47e812a1",
          • "type": "template_version"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "template_version": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/version_history/c4b4cdf5-dc15-41bf-8fa0-58634975d012",
      • "asset": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
      }
    },
  • "included": [
    • {
      • "id": "57132105-75bf-49fc-b40d-151c65f776df",
      • "type": "asset",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "prj_soa",
        • "name": "Project asset",
        • "description": "Project asset description",
        • "archived": false,
        • "actions": [
          • {
            • "name": "connect",
            • "description": "Unde recusandae officiis eligendi."
            },
          • {
            • "name": "index",
            • "description": "Vero qui voluptatem dolorem."
            },
          • {
            • "name": "provision",
            • "description": "Provision resource on existing hardware"
            }
          ],
        • "mintmodel_valid": true
        },

        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "4c8e0c80-05b1-4abd-87f6-a867051e279e",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/4c8e0c80-05b1-4abd-87f6-a867051e279e"
            }
          },
        • "parents": {
          • "data": [
            • {

              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",

        • "can_have_changes": true,
        • "can_have_children": false,

            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },

            • "read": true,
            • "update": true

            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },

            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },

            • "update": true
            }
          }
        }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "e0c691c8-efc2-48e0-9f54-0aed47e812a1",
      • "type": "template_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "version": "2023_Q4_2",
        • "description": "Added additional configuration options",
        • "state": "ready",
        • "created_by": "verlie",
        • "archived": false,
        • "has_mintmodel": true,
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:20.858014Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:20.858014Z",
        • "git_rev": "cross-platform",
        • "commit_sha": "1ce27cc65002608b1ffbd563e3c7c513368874f5",
        • "actions": [
          • {
            • "name": "compress",
            • "description": "Dolor rerum doloremque quia."
            },
          • {
            • "name": "back up",
            • "description": "Voluptate alias blanditiis est."
            }
          ]
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",
        • "template": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Templates

Templates provide the available actions and a base set of repository properties that will be used to configure the asset.

List template versions

Lists all versions of a specific template.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

template_code
required
string
Example: soa

template code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/templates/{template_code}/versions

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "d0e0384c-e3fe-493f-9f2a-fc45cc3212de",

        • "description": "Added additional configuration options",

        • "commit_sha": "48941fb23431d012b0a82d3262a58e6c707262ed",

          • {
            • "name": "navigate",
            • "description": "Nisi laborum fugiat totam."
            },
          • {
            • "name": "synthesize",
            • "description": "Nesciunt ratione quasi et."
            }
          ]
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",

required
object

      • "password": "password",
      • "ssh_key_data": "-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\n...\n-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\n"
      }

      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa",
      • "template_versions": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions"
      },
    • "meta": null
    }
}

Git remotes

Endpoints to interact with git remotes.

Create Git remote

Create a project Git remote.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/git_remotes

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "user": "limepoint",
      • "password": "password",
      • "ssh_key_data": "-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\n...\n-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\n"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "44e304c6-7d92-45a9-b299-50491186997e",
    • "type": "git_remote",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "archived": false,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:56.042763Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:56.042763Z",
      • "user": null,
      • "password": null,
      • "ssh_key_data": null
      },
    • "links": {
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/44e304c6-7d92-45a9-b299-50491186997e"
      },
    • "meta": null
    }
}

Responses

    • {
      • "id": "6116fe2a-44d1-4077-bec7-cd5c497aef66",

        • "name": "github",
        • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",

        • "disabled": false,
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:56.597389Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:56.597389Z",
        • "user": "{{hidden}}",
        • "password": "{{hidden}}",
        • "ssh_key_data": "{{hidden}}"
        },
      • "links": {
        • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/6116fe2a-44d1-4077-bec7-cd5c497aef66"
        },
      • "meta": null
      }
    ]
}

Show Git remote

Shows a project Git remote.

Note: Git remote credentials are obfuscated for security reasons.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

remote_id
required
string
Example: 0e144ef8-3c5b-40ea-9f47-7304fcb936ad

remote id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/git_remotes/{remote_id}

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "b7e9f194-8ff9-41f0-9cdd-3dc3370740cf",
    • "type": "git_remote",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "archived": false,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:56.895859Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:56.895859Z",
      • "user": "{{hidden}}",
      • "password": "{{hidden}}",
      • "ssh_key_data": "{{hidden}}"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/b7e9f194-8ff9-41f0-9cdd-3dc3370740cf"
      },
    • "meta": null
    }
}

required
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "archived": true
      }
    }
}

  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

  • "data": {
    • "id": "b62fa738-f87e-468a-88a9-31e64ae18456",
    • "type": "git_remote",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "archived": true,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:57.160883Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:57.191703Z",
      • "user": "{{hidden}}",
      • "password": "{{hidden}}",
      • "ssh_key_data": "{{hidden}}"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/b62fa738-f87e-468a-88a9-31e64ae18456"

      • "user": "limepoint",
      • "password": "password",

  • 400
  • 404

application/vnd.api+json

      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "archived": false,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:57.620480Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:57.649306Z",
      • "user": "{{hidden}}",
      • "password": "{{hidden}}",
      • "ssh_key_data": "{{hidden}}"
      },

      },

    }
}

Delete Git remote

Deletes a project Git remote if it has no changes, otherwise it removes the credentials.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

id_to_delete
required
string
Example: 0e144ef8-3c5b-40ea-9f47-7304fcb936ad

remote id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/git_remotes/{id_to_delete}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 204
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "1cbab299-d052-4b47-86da-6445da5fee95",
    • "type": "git_remote",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "archived": true,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:58.204576Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:58.396186Z",
      • "user": null,
      • "password": null,
      • "ssh_key_data": null
      },
    • "links": {
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/1cbab299-d052-4b47-86da-6445da5fee95"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "credentials_removed": true,
      • "messages": [
        • "This Git remote cannot be deleted as it is used by a change. Its credentials have been removed."
        ]
      }
    }
}

Bookmarks

Endpoints to interact with bookmarks.

Notes:

  • The list, create, show, update and delete bookmark endpoints are available via the /<path/to/bookmark/owner>/bookmarks path. The example endpoints in this section reflect bookmarks owned by a project asset.

Create bookmark

Create an asset bookmark.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/bookmarks

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "description": "SOA administration console",
      • "url": "https://soa.project_asset.server:7002/admin/console",
      • "created_by": "houston"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "785b8d0b-6ebc-4f4a-a404-b25251a570c3",
    • "type": "bookmark",
    • "attributes": {
      • "url": "https://beier-stokes.test/elwood",
      • "description": "Natus et quam nemo.",
      • "created_by": "domingo.gislason",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:50.537120Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:50.537120Z"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/bookmarks/785b8d0b-6ebc-4f4a-a404-b25251a570c3",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
      }
    }
}

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

required
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/bookmarks

application/vnd.api+json

    • {

        • "url": "https://soa.project_asset.server:7002/admin/console",
        • "description": "SOA administration console",
        • "created_by": "weston_grimes",
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:51.144116Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:51.144116Z"
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/bookmarks/59ff4809-a160-4f25-8ee8-9fa2c1ba648e",
        • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
        }
      }
    ]
}

  • 404

      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:51.903060Z"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/bookmarks/c06efa00-de9b-4326-bc9f-2f8aacc77173",

      }
    }

string

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

MintModels

Endpoints to query and generate MintModels for assets.

Notes:

  • The list, show and generate MintModel endpoints are available for all assets, via the /<path/to/mintmodel/owner>/mintmodels path. The example endpoints in this section reflect MintModels owned by a project asset.
  • The list and show endpoints will display all MintModels for the asset, regardless whether they were applied successfully or not. Use the parent_mintmodel_history link in the API response to access the asset's MintModel history.

List MintModel history

Lists the asset's MintModel history.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodel_history

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "04ab2d7e-ed5f-4888-a339-8ede4abdf90d",
      • "type": "mintmodel_history",
      • "attributes": {
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:00.402835Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:00.402835Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "parents": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "088358dd-9046-4fec-b838-df5be1e014d9",
              • "type": "project"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "0861bc9d-09a1-44e2-ae99-86958af5885d",
              • "type": "asset"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "mintmodel": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "d1ea2e7a-3092-4584-b889-81b87640a006",
            • "type": "mintmodel"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/d1ea2e7a-3092-4584-b889-81b87640a006"
            }
          },
        • "opschain_changes": {
          • "data": [ ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history/04ab2d7e-ed5f-4888-a339-8ede4abdf90d"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Show MintModel history

Shows an asset's MintModel history record.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

id
required
string
Example: 7c0bb1dc-9f23-4912-9e1d-f48b8642b77e

MintModel history id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodel_history/{id}

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "5aa5405f-1d47-4699-8600-1aec7755a6e0",
    • "type": "mintmodel_history",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:00.649251Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:00.649251Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "c92a0712-0e22-4e3f-a656-1d282be81680",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "8643d254-6a5d-4ff8-8758-100b30212c12",
            • "type": "asset"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "mintmodel": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "1e568171-7d3f-478a-8a97-f4fc966a575b",
          • "type": "mintmodel"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/1e568171-7d3f-478a-8a97-f4fc966a575b"
          }
        },
      • "opschain_changes": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history/5aa5405f-1d47-4699-8600-1aec7755a6e0"
      }
    },
  • "included": [
    • {
      • "id": "1e568171-7d3f-478a-8a97-f4fc966a575b",
      • "type": "mintmodel",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "complex": {
            • "json": {
              • "mintmodel": "data"
              }
            }
          },
        • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:00.643863Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:00.643863Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "mintmodel_history": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "5aa5405f-1d47-4699-8600-1aec7755a6e0",
              • "type": "mintmodel_history"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "a560d86f-89fd-4a15-9fb6-c69e79434e27",
              • "type": "mintmodel_history"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/1e568171-7d3f-478a-8a97-f4fc966a575b",
        • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
        }
      }
    ]
}

List MintModels

List all MintModels for an asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "3c6b52a2-df0f-44fe-bd19-09b607d5d86f",
      • "type": "mintmodel",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "complex": {
            • "json": {
              • "mintmodel": "data"
              }
            }
          },
        • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:00.807585Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:00.807585Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "mintmodel_history": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "f9fbbdce-2975-4ea8-82e1-188cb2df8633",
              • "type": "mintmodel_history"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/3c6b52a2-df0f-44fe-bd19-09b607d5d86f",
        • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Show MintModel

Shows an asset MintModel.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

mintmodel_id
required
string
Example: 0fa73159-2ed2-44ea-a6fe-ec1810dbfe11

MintModel id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels/{mintmodel_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "71817e6a-4d87-4866-92b1-d47466f70e1b",
    • "type": "mintmodel",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "complex": {
          • "json": {
            • "mintmodel": "data"
            }
          }
        },
      • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:01.053624Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:01.053624Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "mintmodel_history": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "bc19b22c-78df-42e7-9f44-88b7427230d9",
            • "type": "mintmodel_history"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/71817e6a-4d87-4866-92b1-d47466f70e1b",
      • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
      }
    }
}

Generate MintModel

Generate the MintModel for this asset, using the latest properties and template version.

Note: The endpoint does not store the MintModel, rather it provides a point in time reference for the MintModel content that will be used by a change if one is executed for the asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels/generate

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "ae574e22-eb2e-4cf8-a7eb-d52e61250672",
    • "type": "mintmodel",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "complex": {
          • "json": {
            • "mintmodel": "data"
            }
          }
        },
      • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:01.504051Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:01.504051Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "mintmodel_history": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "1869f72f-e08b-4a9e-bb38-e622c1955e93",
            • "type": "mintmodel_history"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/ae574e22-eb2e-4cf8-a7eb-d52e61250672",
      • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
      }
    }
}

Workflows

Endpoints to interact with enterprise project workflows

List workflows

Lists all workflows for a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows

Response samples

  • 200
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "ea10613c-8802-4851-bb08-f2bdceb3181a",
      • "type": "workflow",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "assets",
        • "name": "assets workflow",
        • "description": "workflow for assets",
        • "draft": false,
        • "archived": false,
        • "created_by": "kenton.lebsack",
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:15:09.324489Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:15:09.324512Z",
        • "source_yaml": "---\ncode: assets\nname: assets workflow\ndescription: workflow for assets\ncreated_by: kenton.lebsack\nsteps:\n- type: change\n name: run asset action\n target: \"/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa\"\n action: run\n",
        • "steps": [
          • {
            • "name": "run asset action",
            • "type": "change",
            • "action": "run",
            • "target": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
            }
          ],
        • "latest_version": 1,
        • "latest_published_version": 1
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets",
        • "runs": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs",
        • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "versions": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions",
        • "latest_version": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/1",
        • "latest_published_version": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/1"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

Create workflow

Create a workflow

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "rpqz2",
      • "name": "parse",
      • "description": "You can't hack the feed without overriding the haptic RAM application!",
      • "steps": [
        • {
          • "type": "change",
          • "target": "/projects/4h8fq/environments/gauaw/assets/5vbj0",
          • "action": "copy",
          • "template_version": "l4kxp",
          • "name": "quia",
          • "start_time": "2025-03-29T07:13:41Z"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "wait",
          • "requires_approval_from": null,
          • "name": "harum"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "workflow",
          • "target": "/projects/o8t0l/workflows/isllj",
          • "version": null,
          • "name": "eveniet",
          • "start_time": "2025-03-29T07:13:41Z"
          },
        • {
          • "run_as": "parallel",
          • "name": "sequi",
          • "children": [
            • {
              • "type": "change",
              • "target": "/projects/pemaj/environments/vwtth/assets/gqioh",
              • "action": "transmit",
              • "template_version": "iermk",
              • "name": "libero",
              • "start_time": null
              },
            • {
              • "type": "wait",
              • "requires_approval_from": "quo",
              • "name": "nobis"
              },
            • {
              • "type": "workflow",
              • "target": "/projects/zd0jc/workflows/cjy0j",
              • "version": null,
              • "name": "qui",
              • "start_time": null
              }
            ]
          },
        • {
          • "run_as": "sequential",
          • "name": "est",
          • "children": [
            • {
              • "type": "change",
              • "target": "/projects/1clrv/environments/cqcbm/assets/0l9sn",
              • "action": "compress",
              • "template_version": "7a124",
              • "name": "voluptatem",
              • "start_time": null
              },
            • {
              • "type": "wait",

              • "name": "dicta"
              },

              • "type": "workflow",
              • "target": "/projects/uw1t3/workflows/dhfgr",
              • "version": 1,
              • "name": "dignissimos",
              • "start_time": null
              }
            ]
          }
        ],
      • "archived": false,
      • "draft": false,
      • "source_yaml": "---\ncode: rpqz2\nname: parse\ndescription: You can't hack the feed without overriding the haptic RAM application!\ncreated_by: williams\nsteps:\n- action: override\n target: \"/projects/x6oie/assets/7q9yp\"\n type: change\n"
      }
    }
}

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

required
object
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "new workflow name",
      • "steps": [
        • {
          • "type": "change",
          • "target": "/projects/4h8fq/environments/gauaw/assets/5vbj0",
          • "action": "copy",
          • "template_version": "l4kxp",
          • "name": "quia",
          • "start_time": "2025-03-29T07:13:41Z"
          },

          • "type": "wait",

              • "type": "change",

              },

      • "source_yaml": "string"
      }
    },

    • "validate": true
    }
}

      }
    }

Delete workflow

Delete or archive a workflow.

  • If the workflow has not been run before, it will be deleted.
  • If the workflow has been run before, it will be archived.
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Workflow versions

List workflow versions

Lists all versions for a workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "0d862d49-edf8-4381-a153-71089a1d255e",
      • "type": "workflow_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "assets",
        • "name": "assets workflow",
        • "description": "workflow for assets",
        • "draft": false,
        • "archived": false,
        • "created_by": "larraine",
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:15:05.516929Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:15:05.516929Z",
        • "source_yaml": "---\ncode: assets\nname: assets workflow\ndescription: workflow for assets\ncreated_by: larraine\nsteps:\n- type: change\n name: run asset action\n target: \"/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa\"\n action: run\n",
        • "steps": [
          • {
            • "name": "run asset action",
            • "type": "change",
            • "action": "run",
            • "target": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
            }
          ],
        • "version": 1
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/1",
        • "runs": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/1/runs",
        • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "workflow": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Delete draft workflow versions

Deletes all draft versions of a workflow.

Note: An exception will be raised if there are no published versions of the workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

string

required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

required
string

Responses

required
object

      • "description": "workflow for assets",
      • "draft": false,
      • "archived": false,

      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:15:07.207883Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:15:07.207883Z",
      • "source_yaml": "---\ncode: assets\nname: assets workflow\ndescription: workflow for assets\ncreated_by: joseph\nsteps:\n- type: change\n name: run asset action\n target: \"/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa\"\n action: run\n",

          }

      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "workflow": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets"
      }

Delete workflow version

Delete or archive a workflow version.

  • If the workflow version has not been run before, it will be deleted.
  • If the workflow version has been run before, it will be archived.
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

version
required
string
Example: 1

version

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions/{version}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Properties

Endpoints to interact with properties.

Show properties

Shows the current properties JSON and its version.

path Parameters
properties_id
required
string
Example: 817e7763-737d-4457-bef2-efdb7e23cea1

properties id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{properties_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "09810820-d1f4-41db-a76d-01e07337efb1",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 1,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:11.969704Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/09810820-d1f4-41db-a76d-01e07337efb1",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/09810820-d1f4-41db-a76d-01e07337efb1/versions/1",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/09810820-d1f4-41db-a76d-01e07337efb1/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update properties

Updates a properties JSON if the included version matches the current properties version.

path Parameters
id_to_update
required
string
Example: 817e7763-737d-4457-bef2-efdb7e23cea1

properties id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{id_to_update}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 1
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "d571cd4c-a3f0-47c6-bbb5-aeced56be785",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:12.272826Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/d571cd4c-a3f0-47c6-bbb5-aeced56be785",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/d571cd4c-a3f0-47c6-bbb5-aeced56be785/versions/2",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/d571cd4c-a3f0-47c6-bbb5-aeced56be785/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update properties (unsafe)

Updates a properties JSON, without any version checking (always updates).

path Parameters
id_to_set
required
string
Example: 817e7763-737d-4457-bef2-efdb7e23cea1

properties id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{id_to_set}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        }
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "7b7fda64-17c7-4299-9d53-a8e4db7b8e15",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:12.879175Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/7b7fda64-17c7-4299-9d53-a8e4db7b8e15",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/7b7fda64-17c7-4299-9d53-a8e4db7b8e15/versions/2",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/7b7fda64-17c7-4299-9d53-a8e4db7b8e15/versions"
      }
    }
}

Properties versions

Endpoints to interact with the version history for properties.

List properties versions

Lists all versions of an OpsChain properties.

path Parameters
properties_id
required
string
Example: 817e7763-737d-4457-bef2-efdb7e23cea1

properties id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{properties_id}/versions

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "6af54f48-d9a8-4497-aea3-91c2750177c8",
      • "type": "properties_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "any_key": "with a value",
          • "another_key": "with a different value",
          • "nested": {
            • "key": "nested value"
            }
          },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:13.370394Z",
        • "owner_type": "project"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "ddb44bd3-385f-4e18-8592-7f9bf27029c9",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/ddb44bd3-385f-4e18-8592-7f9bf27029c9"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "versions": "/api/properties/ddb44bd3-385f-4e18-8592-7f9bf27029c9/versions",
        • "owner": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "self": "/api/properties/ddb44bd3-385f-4e18-8592-7f9bf27029c9/versions/1"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Show properties version

Shows the properties JSON for this properties version.

path Parameters
properties_id
required
string
Example: 817e7763-737d-4457-bef2-efdb7e23cea1

properties id

version_number
required
integer
Example: 1

version number

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{properties_id}/versions/{version_number}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "10b8d03b-e9e1-418c-934a-acdb3121e811",
    • "type": "properties_version",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 1,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:13.675345Z",
      • "owner_type": "project"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "0d6065ac-3f0c-4559-a83e-33995be862b1",
          • "type": "properties"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/0d6065ac-3f0c-4559-a83e-33995be862b1"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "versions": "/api/properties/0d6065ac-3f0c-4559-a83e-33995be862b1/versions",
      • "owner": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "self": "/api/properties/0d6065ac-3f0c-4559-a83e-33995be862b1/versions/1"
      }
    }
}

Changes

Endpoints to interact with changes.

List changes

Lists all changes.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[environment_code_eq]=dev

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=changes.csv

Download changes in CSV format with the specified file name. The changes will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

include
string
Example: include=steps,parents

Include the change steps and parents in the response

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
object
Array of objects or objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/changes

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "1157d873-0ae8-44bd-a4e2-ba2d9246abd4",

          • "asset"
          ],
        • "can_have_workflows": false,

          • "properties": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "settings": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "scheduled_activities": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "changes": {
            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },
          • "assets": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "self": {
            • "update": true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "partial_response": false,
    • "has_any": true
    }
}

Create change

Creates a change in a specific project, environment or asset.

Notes:

  1. When creating changes via a project, environment or asset changes path (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/changes) the parent_path request attributes must not be supplied as the parent will be derived from the path.
  2. When creating changes for assets (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/changes) the git_remote_name and git_rev attributes must not be supplied as the Git remote and revision will be derived from the asset's template.
Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "metadata": {
        • "pixel": "bypassing"
        },
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "system": "synthesizing"
        },
      • "action": "back_up",
      • "parent_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev/assets/env_soa",
      • "template_version": "2023_Q4_2"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "f990a045-d4ff-4c66-97b7-c9dacc453e81",
    • "type": "change",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_by": "coretta",
      • "name": null,
      • "action": "copy",
      • "initial_step_tree": null,
      • "metadata": {
        • "transmitter": "backing up"
        },
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "monitor": "transmitting"
        },
      • "scheduled": false,
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "status_code": "initializing",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:53.682765Z",
      • "started_at": null,
      • "finished_at": null,
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:53.685541Z",
      • "asset_name": null,
      • "environment_name": "Development",
      • "project_name": "OpsChain",
      • "git_remote_name": "github",
      • "git_rev": "main",
      • "commit_sha": null,
      • "requires_approval_from": null
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "a9a2c681-0487-4ed5-97d6-13262a9deab6",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "782b4454-81a1-4f51-b707-09b8c854ae92",
            • "type": "environment"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "root_step": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "4a4a3cc5-702e-41e4-a655-0fe02eacab5d",
          • "type": "step"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/steps/4a4a3cc5-702e-41e4-a655-0fe02eacab5d"
          }
        },
      • "steps": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "4a4a3cc5-702e-41e4-a655-0fe02eacab5d",
            • "type": "step"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": null
        },
      • "workflow": {
        • "data": null
        }
      },

      • "log_lines": "/api/changes/f990a045-d4ff-4c66-97b7-c9dacc453e81/log_lines"
      },
    • "meta": { }
    },
  • "included": [
    • {

      }
    ]
}

Show change

Shows a change, including it's parent nodes.

path Parameters
change_id
required
string
Example: dd20e0ec-8a5d-4fe4-ab1d-5975305786ec

change id

query Parameters
include
string
Example: include=steps,parents

Include the change steps and parents in the response

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/changes/{change_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type

Cancel change

Cancels a change.

path Parameters
change_id
required
string
Example: dd20e0ec-8a5d-4fe4-ab1d-5975305786ec

change id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes/{change_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Scheduled activities

List activities

Lists all scheduled activities.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[project_code_eq]=opc

API filtering guide

include
string
Example: include=parents

Include the scheduled change parents in the response

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of scheduled_change_element (object) or scheduled_workflow_element (object)
Array of project_element (object) or environment_element (object) or asset_element (object)
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "c9ba5862-905c-4f22-b552-427c935008cb",
      • "type": "scheduled_change",

        • "created_by": "gino.friesen",
