          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "a75349ab-cdd6-4071-b760-4c4800657165",
              • "type": "project"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "1d56cce9-2117-481c-8603-eb491b53789d",
            • "type": "settings"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/settings/1d56cce9-2117-481c-8603-eb491b53789d"
            }
          },
        • "project": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "a75349ab-cdd6-4071-b760-4c4800657165",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/projects/opc"
            }
          },
        • "children": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "bookmarks": {
          • "data": [ ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",
        • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/bookmarks",
        • "changes": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/changes",
        • "scheduled_activities": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/scheduled_activities",
        • "parent": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "assets": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/assets"
        },
      • "meta": {
        • "can_have_changes": true,
        • "can_have_children": true,
        • "can_have_properties": true,
        • "can_have_settings": true,
        • "can_have_templates": false,
        • "requires_template": false,
        • "child_node_types": [
          • "asset"
          ],
        • "can_have_workflows": false,
        • "authorisations": {
          • "properties": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "settings": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "scheduled_activities": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "changes": {
            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },
          • "assets": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "self": {
            • "update": true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "has_any": true
    }
}

Create activities

Creates a scheduled activity in a specific project, environment or asset.

Notes:

  1. When creating scheduled activities via a project, environment or asset scheduled_activities path (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/scheduled_activities) the parent_path request attributes must not be supplied as the parent will be derived from the path.

  2. When creating scheduled activities for assets (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/scheduled_activities) the git_remote_name and git_rev attributes must not be supplied as the Git remote and revision will be derived from the asset's template.

  3. See the various payload examples to understand the required fields for each possible request to this endpoint.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "git_rev": "master",
      • "action": "install_os",
      • "cron_schedule": "15 20 10 1 0",
      • "new_commits_only": false,
      • "repeat": false,
      • "metadata": {
        • "driver": "connecting"
        },
      • "parent_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "9efffd05-d8cf-4c61-b78e-eb1cc1d6a50a",
    • "type": "scheduled_change",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_by": "tod.kutch",
      • "cron_schedule": "42 11 18 6 0",
      • "repeat": false,
      • "metadata": {
        • "matrix": "calculating"
        },
      • "enabled": true,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:48.220188Z",
      • "next_run_at": "2025-06-01T01:42:00.000000Z",
      • "action": "different_action",
      • "new_commits_only": false,
      • "git_rev": "back-end",
      • "project_name": "OpsChain",
      • "project_code": "opc",
      • "asset_code": null,
      • "asset_name": null,
      • "environment_code": "dev",
      • "environment_name": "Development",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "8080e729-51d5-443a-b808-f1fa8a2bbf14",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "db9ac8aa-2b9c-4344-b45f-1ae8b044c55a",
            • "type": "environment"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "git_remote": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/828d06d0-90b3-42f8-b181-fb265229ce33",
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "self": "/api/scheduled_activities/9efffd05-d8cf-4c61-b78e-eb1cc1d6a50a"
      }
    }
}

Show activity

Shows a scheduled activity.

path Parameters
scheduled_change_id
required
string
Example: 672bf0be-7113-4a24-b0c7-ee1f6269b139

scheduled change id

query Parameters
include
string
Example: include=parents

Include the scheduled change parents in the response

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
scheduled_change_element (object) or scheduled_workflow_element (object)
Array of project_element (object) or environment_element (object) or asset_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities/{scheduled_change_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{

Delete activity

Deletes a scheduled activity.

path Parameters
scheduled_change_id
required
string
Example: 672bf0be-7113-4a24-b0c7-ee1f6269b139

scheduled change id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities/{scheduled_change_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Steps

Endpoints to interact with change steps.

List steps

Lists all steps.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[action_eq]=provision

API filtering guide

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/steps

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "30ae7eef-fc9a-4870-9a37-02faa80e96e9",
      • "type": "step",
      • "attributes": {
        • "approved_by": [ ],
        • "rejected_by": [ ],
        • "continued_by": [ ],

        • "started_at": "2025-03-28T07:06:52.289615Z",
        • "finished_at": "2025-03-28T07:08:35.337395Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:16.271341Z",
        • "status_code": "success"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "a8d41f70-9ce8-4735-933b-03db9469cd5c",
            • "type": "properties"

          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "c216ead8-6242-4e96-92a6-632265b5c766",

        }
      }
    ]
}

Show step

Shows a change step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 624cf9d7-9ed8-4372-a220-952eca47fe89

step id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

        }
      }
    ]
}

Continue step

Continues a "waiting" change step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 7bece137-41e4-4fe4-ac05-1aab56858214

step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}/continue

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Manually removed from load balancer."

    }

Log lines

Endpoints to query log lines for changes and individual change steps.

List change log lines

List the log lines for a change.

path Parameters
change_id
required
string
Example: dd20e0ec-8a5d-4fe4-ab1d-5975305786ec
query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=change.log

Download the log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/changes/{change_id}/log_lines

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "9dfad863-26c9-4458-8814-03eec564abe9",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "change_id": "a5051d5c-6a8b-40e9-ada1-6b3e491cd3a4",
        • "step_id": "d01751a6-0160-4ee2-ba25-f1c4532ff953",
        • "message": "Aliquam dolorem dolor exercitationem.",
        • "logged_at": "2025-03-27T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

List step log lines

List the log lines for a change step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 624cf9d7-9ed8-4372-a220-952eca47fe89
query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=step.log

Download the log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}/log_lines

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "0dcb325a-e7f0-4c9b-8ef2-3f6d38c06d8d",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "change_id": "944bdd00-b883-416b-8852-54e9ba36db2e",
        • "step_id": "9b8e34d5-be8c-4c0a-b91a-bdce160b5c50",
        • "message": "Molestias asperiores nihil aliquid.",
        • "logged_at": "2025-03-27T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

List filtered log lines

List filtered log lines.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

limit
integer [ 1 .. 1000 ]
Default: 10000
Example: limit=50

Limit the number of log lines returned

download
string
Example: download=opschain.log

Download the filtered log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/log_lines

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "71401ad4-abd4-42a6-88a9-e6d18a61cdc0",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "change_id": "377fb1f0-8fff-4139-9a6b-871fbd325ee6",
        • "step_id": "06165899-bf4a-420f-b4e1-dc6889b4efbc",
        • "message": "Eum aut dolorum est.",
        • "logged_at": "2025-03-27T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

Workflow runs

Endpoints to interact with workflow runs

Notes:

  • The list and show endpoints are available via the following paths:
    1. /workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs accessible to the user.
    2. /project/{project_code}/workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs for all this project's workflows.
    3. /project/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs this workflow.
    4. /<path/to/asset>/workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs that include a change for this asset.

List all workflow runs

Lists all workflow runs.

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
object
Array of objects or objects or objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

    }

Run a workflow

Runs a pre-defined workflow

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "project_code": "opc",
      • "workflow_code": "assets"
      }
    }

  • 400
  • 422

Show workflow run

Shows a workflow run.

path Parameters
run_id
required
string
Example: cff20821-b448-47b8-9da5-6fb679cbe354

workflow run id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects or objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

        • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/d8004cae-758c-4232-986e-a4130b902594"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Cancel workflow run

Cancels a workflow run.

path Parameters
run_id
required
string
Example: cff20821-b448-47b8-9da5-6fb679cbe354

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

List workflow runs (workflow specific)

Lists all runs for a workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
object
Array of objects or objects or objects or objects or objects
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs

Run a workflow (workflow specific)

Runs a pre-defined workflow

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "workflow_code": "assets"
      }
    }

Show workflow run (workflow specific)

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: cff20821-b448-47b8-9da5-6fb679cbe354

workflow run id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
Array of objects or objects or objects or objects or objects

Cancel workflow run (workflow specific)

Cancels a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: cff20821-b448-47b8-9da5-6fb679cbe354

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Workflow steps

Endpoints to interact with the steps in a workflow run

List all workflow steps

Lists all workflow steps.

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

Show a workflow step

Shows a workflow step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 5e64226b-ccf1-4d5f-a4c4-ebf3da341ab2

workflow step id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "9ffb824b-5071-41eb-aa7d-8a031a7c9bfb",
    • "type": "workflow_noop_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "lock_version": 0,
      • "created_by": "yen",
      • "name": "cumque",
      • "status_code": "success",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:40.315775Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-03-28T07:06:57.026243Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-03-28T07:07:24.203784Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:40.315775Z",
      • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "608eb16e-7cab-4cf8-8e65-2a42652a3a62",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "f3f4b2d5-8af2-4f2f-aa41-170e69457a5c",
            • "type": "workflow_wait_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "91d66d56-5d95-4d3a-b722-f4876cd47ccd",
            • "type": "workflow_noop_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "1921e29b-7922-446c-a266-f196a005148b",
            • "type": "workflow_change_step"
            },
          • {

      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/608eb16e-7cab-4cf8-8e65-2a42652a3a62/steps/9ffb824b-5071-41eb-aa7d-8a031a7c9bfb",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/608eb16e-7cab-4cf8-8e65-2a42652a3a62",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/608eb16e-7cab-4cf8-8e65-2a42652a3a62"
      }
    }
}

Continue workflow step

Continues a "waiting" workflow step. To approve/reject a workflow step that needs approval see the approve workflow step API endpoint.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 8d35c50f-4569-4ec9-9b23-c870a9f84114

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}/continue

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Done sanity checks. Ok to continue."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "c15dd7b0-540f-4d3c-83fe-36456d649aea",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "sharice.beier",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "requires_approval_from": null,
      • "lock_version": 1,
      • "created_by": "dani_kuhn",
      • "name": "Wait",
      • "status_code": "continued",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:05:43.627732Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-03-28T07:06:43.627732Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:43.035868Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:43.043727Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "c280af0c-595c-4589-a63c-a8a68f1c3040",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/c280af0c-595c-4589-a63c-a8a68f1c3040/steps/c15dd7b0-540f-4d3c-83fe-36456d649aea",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/c280af0c-595c-4589-a63c-a8a68f1c3040/steps/b8698947-9bd3-4fcd-a138-8d6c02e228b1",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/c280af0c-595c-4589-a63c-a8a68f1c3040"
      }
    }
}

Approve workflow step

Approve a workflow step that requires approval. To continue a workflow step that does need approval see the continue workflow step API endpoint

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 8d35c50f-4569-4ec9-9b23-c870a9f84114

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}/approve

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 403
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "0bd9ebc9-e103-460c-9ac2-5549ea10dfe4",

Reject workflow step

Reject a workflow step that requires approval.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 8d35c50f-4569-4ec9-9b23-c870a9f84114

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}/reject

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }

List workflow steps (run specific)

Lists all steps in a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: cff20821-b448-47b8-9da5-6fb679cbe354

workflow run id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps

Response samples

  • 200
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [

Show workflow step (run specific)

Shows a step of a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: cff20821-b448-47b8-9da5-6fb679cbe354

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: 5e64226b-ccf1-4d5f-a4c4-ebf3da341ab2

workflow step id

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "f7271e02-9446-4c95-a35e-e905f5286eda",
    • "type": "workflow_noop_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "lock_version": 0,
      • "created_by": "kaleigh.schowalter",
      • "name": "voluptatem",
      • "status_code": "success",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:53.505246Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-03-28T07:07:47.861024Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:15.073500Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:53.505246Z",
      • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "6b595427-207f-4a68-a446-e93a062c4935",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "e2d0f51e-75ee-40d7-aeb4-a911b98456b3",
            • "type": "workflow_wait_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "3e683a62-6475-400c-ac4f-37601cd4984a",
            • "type": "workflow_noop_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "fa846d43-cabe-4299-a191-9bad495f75e8",
            • "type": "workflow_change_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "f75a1853-db3a-4f76-b0b0-8d07b9ce291a",
            • "type": "workflow_wait_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "b1c5ddf1-c700-42c8-8307-5e79b9120036",
            • "type": "workflow_workflow_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "6a4c3b7c-ae1e-4bb3-88fc-73e52e0c79dc",
            • "type": "workflow_change_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "b6f1bcaa-7099-4b7d-b17b-68b1d5548b4e",
            • "type": "workflow_workflow_step"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/6b595427-207f-4a68-a446-e93a062c4935/steps/f7271e02-9446-4c95-a35e-e905f5286eda",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/6b595427-207f-4a68-a446-e93a062c4935",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/6b595427-207f-4a68-a446-e93a062c4935"
      }
    }
}

Continue workflow step (run specific)

Continues a "waiting" workflow step. To approve/reject a workflow step that needs approval see the approve workflow step API endpoint.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: cff20821-b448-47b8-9da5-6fb679cbe354

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: 8d35c50f-4569-4ec9-9b23-c870a9f84114

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}/continue

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Done sanity checks. Ok to continue."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "00e1206c-d3f0-4c40-a638-52eec8f78f97",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "opal_labadie",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "requires_approval_from": null,
      • "lock_version": 1,
      • "created_by": "winston.schuster",
      • "name": "Wait",
      • "status_code": "continued",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:07:39.695367Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-03-28T07:08:39.695367Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:56.572468Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:56.581452Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "69b995e6-869e-44a0-9cf0-1024697f4e09",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/69b995e6-869e-44a0-9cf0-1024697f4e09/steps/00e1206c-d3f0-4c40-a638-52eec8f78f97",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/69b995e6-869e-44a0-9cf0-1024697f4e09/steps/65e3d1aa-67a5-4958-9004-6a88d142d556",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/69b995e6-869e-44a0-9cf0-1024697f4e09"
      }
    }
}

Approve workflow step (run specific)

Approve a workflow step that requires approval. To continue a workflow step that does need approval see the continue workflow step API endpoint

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: cff20821-b448-47b8-9da5-6fb679cbe354

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: 8d35c50f-4569-4ec9-9b23-c870a9f84114

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}/approve

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 403
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "498c31d1-f453-475a-910a-b349160471d5",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "weston_koepp",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [ ],
      • "requires_approval_from": "an-ldap-group",
      • "lock_version": 1,
      • "created_by": "raphael",
      • "name": "Approval",
      • "status_code": "approved",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:08:48.005070Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-03-28T07:09:48.005070Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:59.047719Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:59.055888Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "d2dbd603-6564-4568-a8d6-a69a047b9718",

          }

      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },

      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/d2dbd603-6564-4568-a8d6-a69a047b9718/steps/f014ff65-7d7f-41ab-8f94-a7af09545cde",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/d2dbd603-6564-4568-a8d6-a69a047b9718"
      }
    }
}

Reject workflow step (run specific)

Reject a workflow step that requires approval.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: cff20821-b448-47b8-9da5-6fb679cbe354

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: 8d35c50f-4569-4ec9-9b23-c870a9f84114

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
workflow_noop_step_element (object) or workflow_change_step_element (object) or workflow_wait_step_element (object) or workflow_workflow_step_element (object)
https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}/reject

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 403
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "8af271e4-d3d8-49ca-a05f-aa71bfe51700",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "titus",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "continued_by": [ ],
      • "requires_approval_from": "an-ldap-group",
      • "lock_version": 1,
      • "created_by": "thanh.zemlak",
      • "name": "Approval",
      • "status_code": "rejected",
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:06:56.200156Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-03-28T07:07:56.200156Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-03-28T07:15:02.397187Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:15:02.404798Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "b21b3eea-a10e-41bf-bd60-e14ade312fd2",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/b21b3eea-a10e-41bf-bd60-e14ade312fd2/steps/8af271e4-d3d8-49ca-a05f-aa71bfe51700",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/b21b3eea-a10e-41bf-bd60-e14ade312fd2/steps/bd918122-6306-4369-bad7-76a31888cd4e",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/b21b3eea-a10e-41bf-bd60-e14ade312fd2"
      }
    }
}

Events

Endpoints to interact with events.

List events

Lists all events.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[query_param_code_eq]=opc

API filtering guide

limit
integer [ 1 .. 1000 ]
Default: 10
Example: limit=50

Limit the number of events returned

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
Array of objects
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/events

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "32d4b8d9-0e0d-4bc7-ab93-219ec4dd0a2c",
      • "type": "event",
      • "attributes": {
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          },
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "username": "devorah.senger",
        • "system": false,
        • "type": "my custom event",
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:54.915500Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "source": {
          • "links": {
            • "source": "/api/projects/opc"
            },
          • "data": {
            • "id": "b81755c1-7e45-4c31-90ee-643d5a536066",
            • "type": "project"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/events/32d4b8d9-0e0d-4bc7-ab93-219ec4dd0a2c"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

      • "any_key": "with a value",
      • "another_key": "with a different value",

        • "key": "nested value"
        }

required
object

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "c453d09f-0de2-4de8-aa3e-c4f5e4cba7a4",
    • "type": "settings",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "change_log_retention_days": 10,
        • "event_retention_days": 5
        },
      • "version": 1,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:13.966364Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/settings/c453d09f-0de2-4de8-aa3e-c4f5e4cba7a4",
      • "current_version": "/api/settings/c453d09f-0de2-4de8-aa3e-c4f5e4cba7a4/versions/1",
      • "versions": "/api/settings/c453d09f-0de2-4de8-aa3e-c4f5e4cba7a4/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update settings

Updates a settings JSON if the included version matches the current settings version.

path Parameters
id_to_update
required
string
Example: c671cea6-a96c-464e-8098-d95e1df47dbe

settings id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/settings/{id_to_update}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "change_log_retention_days": 10,
        • "event_retention_days": 5,
        • "notifications": {
          • "targets": {
            • "slack": [
              • "https://slack.com"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
      • "version": 1
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "7e9d0628-ca58-4c23-8718-737a57825396",
    • "type": "settings",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "change_log_retention_days": 10,
        • "event_retention_days": 5,
        • "notifications": {
          • "targets": {
            • "slack": [
              • "https://slack.com"
              ]
            }
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:14.271572Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/settings/7e9d0628-ca58-4c23-8718-737a57825396",
      • "current_version": "/api/settings/7e9d0628-ca58-4c23-8718-737a57825396/versions/2",
      • "versions": "/api/settings/7e9d0628-ca58-4c23-8718-737a57825396/versions"
      }
    }
}

required
string

object

required
object

        • "change_log_retention_days": 10,

        • "notifications": {
          • "targets": {
            • "slack": [

required
string
Example: c671cea6-a96c-464e-8098-d95e1df47dbe

Responses

required
Array of objects

  • 404
Content type

  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "96b54da4-cc3f-4939-b54d-a79b6b735846",
      • "type": "settings_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "change_log_retention_days": 10,
          • "event_retention_days": 5
          },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:14:15.588157Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "settings": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "d766ff7e-afe9-4b51-9858-2d645acdcbf4",

            },

            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "versions": "/api/settings/d766ff7e-afe9-4b51-9858-2d645acdcbf4/versions",
        • "owner": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "self": "/api/settings/d766ff7e-afe9-4b51-9858-2d645acdcbf4/versions/1"
        }
      }
    ]
}

required
integer

        • "event_retention_days": 5

Create rule

Create an authorisation rule.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_rules

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "path": "^(/[^/]+/[^/]+)*/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "allow": false,
      • "rule_action": "readable",
      • "name": "Unauthorise development"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "47e552a7-28e6-42b4-9624-6b37735b84af",
    • "type": "authorisation_rule",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "program",
      • "path": "^/projects/esqam/environments/myucr",
      • "rule_action": "readable",
      • "allow": false,
      • "created_by": "richie",
      • "system": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:45.108918Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:45.108918Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "authorisation_policies": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_rules/47e552a7-28e6-42b4-9624-6b37735b84af"
      }
    }
}

Update authorisation rule

Update an authorisation rule.

path Parameters
authorisation_rule_id
required
string
Example: 2e319307-3cae-4593-a79c-99a1a8d22457

authorisation rule id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

Response Schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_rules/{authorisation_rule_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "path": "/projects/demo/environments/dev",
      • "allow": false,
      • "rule_action": "read",
      • "name": "Deny read on dev environment"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "f372e811-9c03-4e95-b6e8-dbf4e23dda6d",
    • "type": "authorisation_rule",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Deny read on dev environment",
      • "path": "^(/[^/]+/[^/]+)*/projects/demo/environments/dev",
      • "rule_action": "readable",
      • "allow": false,
      • "created_by": "emelina_hayes",
      • "system": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:45.898379Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-03-28T07:13:45.942657Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "authorisation_policies": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "d9d22a2c-3e13-4536-a7ec-60427cd64314",
            • "type": "authorisation_policy"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_rules/f372e811-9c03-4e95-b6e8-dbf4e23dda6d"
      }
    }
}

required
object

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "0",
    • "type": "info",
    • "attributes": {
      • "version": "2025-03-28",
      • "runner_image": "limepoint/opschain-runner:2025-03-28",
      • "db_version": "17.2",
      • "api_version": "7.1.5.1"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/info"
      }
    }
}
